com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

Class SpenNoteFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenNoteFile

  • public class SpenNoteFile
extends Object
    SpenNoteFile class This class provides methods for managing SPD files.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
      Landscape orientation
      If a SpenNoteDoc has this type, the SpenNoteDoc is landscape.
      static int ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT
      Portrait orientation.
      If a SpenNoteDoc has this type, the SpenNoteDoc is portrait.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copy(String destFilePath, String srcFilePath)
      Copy the file from the specified source path to the specified destination path.
      The SpenNoteDoc in the copied file gets a new UUID.
      static String getAppName(String filePath)
      Get the application name of the specified file.
      static void getAppVersion(String filePath, Integer major, Integer minor, StringBuffer patchName)
      Get the application version of the specified file.
      static String getCoverImagePath(Context context, String filePath)
      Get the cover image from the specified file.
      NOTICE: Call releaseCoverImagePath(String) when don't access the image anymore.
      static long getCreatedTime(String spdPath)
      Get the note created time
      static int getFormatVersion(String filePath)
      Get the version of file format of the specified file.

      Get the last modified time.

      Get the orientation of the specified file.

      Get the width and height of the specified file.

      Check if the internal cache directory has unsaved information on the note.

      Check if the specified file is set as a favorite.

      Check if the file is locked(encrypted).
      But, you don't verify whether the file is locked by normal password or signature.

      Check if the specified file is a valid SPD file.
      static void lock(Context context, String filePath, String password)
      Lock(encrypt) the specified file.

      Delete cover image cache folder from cover image path.

      Remove all cache directories which are related with given file.
      CAUTION!! You should call this method very carefully.
      If there is a NoteDoc instance which is loaded from the file, the NoteDoc instance will not work properly.

      Remove the note data in the specified file.

        public static final int ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
        Landscape orientation
        If a SpenNoteDoc has this type, the SpenNoteDoc is landscape.
        Since:

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        public static void lock(Context context,
                        String filePath,
                        String password)
                 throws IOException,
                        SpenUnsupportedTypeException
        Lock(encrypt) the specified file.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        password - The password for the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the file is not found, or if a temporary directory cannot be created.
        SpenUnsupportedTypeException - Thrown if the file is not in SPD file format.
        NullPointerException - Thrown if context is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if filePath is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        unlock(Context, String, String), isLocked(String)

      • unlock

        public static void unlock(Context context,
                          String filePath,
                          String password)
                   throws IOException,
                          SpenInvalidPasswordException,
                          SpenUnsupportedTypeException
        Unlock(decrypt) the specified file.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        password - The password for the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the cache directory cannot be created or the file is not found.
        SpenInvalidPasswordException - Thrown if the password is wrong.
        SpenUnsupportedTypeException - Thrown if the file is not in SPD file format.
        NullPointerException - Thrown if context is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if filePath or password is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        lock(Context, String, String), isLocked(String)

      • isLocked

        public static boolean isLocked(String filePath)
        Check if the file is locked(encrypted).
        But, you don't verify whether the file is locked by normal password or signature. If you want to verify it, please use SpenNoteFileSignature#isLocked(String).
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        true, if the file is locked.
        false, if the file is not locked.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        lock(Context, String, String), unlock(Context, String, String), SpenNoteFileSignature#isLocked(String)

      • copy

        public static void copy(String destFilePath,
                        String srcFilePath)
                 throws IOException,
                        SpenUnsupportedTypeException
        Copy the file from the specified source path to the specified destination path.
        The SpenNoteDoc in the copied file gets a new UUID.
        Parameters:
        destFilePath - The destination file path.
        srcFilePath - The source file path.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if destFilePath is null.
        Thrown if srcFilePath is null.
        IOException - Thrown if the file cannot be copied or if the file is not found.
        SpenUnsupportedTypeException - Thrown if the file is not in SPD file format
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setFavorite

        public static void setFavorite(String filePath,
                               boolean flag)
                        throws IOException,
                               SpenUnsupportedTypeException
        Set the specified file as a favorite.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        flag - Set to true to set the file as a favorite, set to false to not set the file as a favorite.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the file is not found.
        SpenUnsupportedTypeException - Thrown if the file is not in SPD file format.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the filePath is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        isFavorite(String)

      • isFavorite

        public static boolean isFavorite(String filePath)
        Check if the specified file is set as a favorite.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        true, if the file is set as a favorite.
        false, if the file is not set as a favorite.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        setFavorite(String, boolean)

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(String filePath)
        Check if the specified file is a valid SPD file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        true, if the specified file is a valid SPD file.
        false, if the specified file is not a valid SPD file.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setCoverImage

        public static void setCoverImage(Context context,
                                 String filePath,
                                 String password,
                                 String imageFilePath)
                          throws IOException,
                                 SpenUnsupportedTypeException
        Set the specified cover image for the specified file.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        filePath - The absolute file path.
        password - The password for the file. If the file is not locked, please enter null.
        imageFilePath - The absolute path of the cover image.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the cache directory cannot be created or if the file is not found.
        SpenUnsupportedTypeException - Thrown if the file is not in SPD file format.
        NullPointerException - Thrown if the context is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if filePath or imageFilePath is null.
        RuntimeException - Thrown if password is null (for locked files) or is invalid (for unlocked file).
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        getCoverImagePath(Context, String)

      • getCoverImagePath

        public static String getCoverImagePath(Context context,
                                       String filePath)
        Get the cover image from the specified file.
        NOTICE: Call releaseCoverImagePath(String) when don't access the image anymore.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        The absolute path of the cover image.
        null, if the file has no cover image or if there is any error.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Thrown if context or filePath is invalid.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        setCoverImage(Context, String, String, String)

      • releaseCoverImagePath

        public static void releaseCoverImagePath(String coverImagePath)
        Delete cover image cache folder from cover image path. Free cache after none refer to the cover image which get from getCoverImagePath(Context, String)
        Parameters:
        coverImagePath -
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throw if coverImagePath is null.
        Since:
        4.0.0
        See Also:
        getCoverImagePath(Context, String)

      • getOrientation

        public static int getOrientation(String filePath)
        Get the orientation of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        The orientation of the file. ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE or ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE, ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT

      • hasUnsavedData

        public static boolean hasUnsavedData(Context context,
                                     String filePath,
                                     Long lastEditedTime)
        Check if the internal cache directory has unsaved information on the note.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        lastEditedTime - The time when the note was last edited. (output parameter)
        Returns:
        true, if there is unsaved information on the note in the internal cache directory.
        false, if there is no unsaved information on the note in the internal cache directory.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • removeNote

        public static void removeNote(String filePath)
                       throws IOException,
                              SpenUnsupportedTypeException
        Remove the note data in the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the cache directory cannot be created or if the file is not found.
        SpenUnsupportedTypeException - Thrown if the file is not in SPD file format.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the filePath is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        SpenNoteDoc.attachToFile(String)

      • getSize

        public static void getSize(String filePath,
                           Integer width,
                           Integer height)
        Get the width and height of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        width - The width of the note in pixels. (output parameter)
        height - The height of the note in pixels. (output parameter)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the filePath is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • getAppName

        public static String getAppName(String filePath)
        Get the application name of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        The application name.
        This method returns an empty string, if SpenNoteDoc.setAppName(String) sets the application name to "null"
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the filePath is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        SpenNoteDoc.setAppName(String)

      • getAppVersion

        public static void getAppVersion(String filePath,
                                 Integer major,
                                 Integer minor,
                                 StringBuffer patchName)
        Get the application version of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        major - The major version of the note. (output parameter)
        minor - The minor version of the note. (output parameter)
        patchName - The patch name of the note. (output parameter)
        This method outputs an empty string, if SpenNoteDoc.setAppVersion(int, int, String) sets the patch name to "null".
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the filePath is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        SpenNoteDoc.setAppVersion(int, int, String)

      • getFormatVersion

        public static int getFormatVersion(String filePath)
        Get the version of file format of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        The version of file format.
        0, if the filePath is invalid or if the file is not a valid SPD file.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • removeCache

        public static void removeCache(Context context,
                               String filePath)
        Remove all cache directories which are related with given file.
        CAUTION!! You should call this method very carefully.
        If there is a NoteDoc instance which is loaded from the file, the NoteDoc instance will not work properly. Not only the NoteDoc instance is writable mode but also read-only mode. And if a cache directory is removed while it is using by any NoteDoc instance, it can cause a crash problem.
        So, you should call this method only if you can ensure that there is NO NoteDoc instance using the file.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Since:
        3.1.1

      • getLastModifiedTime

        public static long getLastModifiedTime(String spdPath)
        Get the last modified time.
        Parameters:
        spdPath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        The time when the note was last edited.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the filePath is null
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getCreatedTime

        public static long getCreatedTime(String spdPath)
        Get the note created time
        Parameters:
        spdPath - The absolute path of the file.
        Returns:
        The created time
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the filePath is null
        Since:
        5.0.0
